title: How to say 'Most people do not really want freedom, because freedom involves responsibility' in Urdu - Quora

response.answer_text: There will be not much difference if I translate it in Hindi only some word would be different .So it's translation in Urdu is۔ “Bahot se logo ko azaadi nhi chahiye Kyu k azaadi me zimmedariya bhi shaamil hoti hai” بہت سے لوگوں کو آذادی نہیں چاہےء کیونکہ آذادی میں ذمہ داریاں شامل ہوتی ہے۔
